import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react' import Admin_header from './Admin_header' import axios from 'axios' function SimpleViewPackage() { const [pack,setpack]=useState([]) useEffect(()=>{ fetchdata() },[]) const fetchdata=async()=>{ const res = await axios.get("http://localhost:3000/packges") setpack(res.data) } return (
ID Country Days Person Price Description Image Action
1 Mark Otto @mdo Mark Otto @mdo
) } export default SimpleViewPackage
